params.controller: The controller that projects are made from.
params.deployer: The deployer to launch Croptop projects from.
params.store: The contract storing NFT data for newly deployed collections.

params.allowedPosts: The type of posts that the project should allow.
params.contractUri: A link to the collection's metadata.
params.name: The name of the collection where posts will go.
params.owner: The address that'll own the project.
params.symbol: The symbol of the collection where posts will go.
params.terminalConfigurations: The terminals that the network uses to accept payments through.

returns.projectId: The ID of the newly created project.

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.details: Make sure only mints can be received.

CONTROLLER().notice: The controller that projects are made from.

DEPLOYER().notice: The deployer to launch Croptop recorded collections from.

STORE().notice: The contract storing NFT data for newly deployed collections.

deployProjectFor(address,(address,addres.notice: Deploy a simple project meant to receive posts from Croptop templates.

documentation.text: @notice The controller that projects are made from.
@notice The deployer to launch Croptop recorded collections from.
@notice The contract storing NFT data for newly deployed collections.

function (uint256) pure returns (struct JB721TierConfig memory[] memory)
